items.title: British couple freed by Taliban hug daughter in emotional reunion
items.description: Barbie, 76, and Peter Reynolds, 80, arrive in Qatar after being detained in Afghanistan for months.

items.title: Minister rejects Trump's call for military to tackle illegal migration
items.description: US President Donald Trump suggested the military could help tackle illegal migration to the UK.

items.title: Watch: Hugs on tarmac as family reunite after Afghan ordeal
items.description: The couple's family say they are "overwhelmed with gratitude and relief" at their release.

items.title: US TV hosts back Kimmel as Trump threatens TV networks
items.description: America's leading late-night TV hosts lament Jimmy Kimmel's suspension as a "blatant assault on freedom of speech".

items.title: First students evacuated from Gaza to study in UK
items.description: The group includes at least four medical doctors who have places to study at UK universities.
